experiences.title: Cloud Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: New York Life – Digital R&D Lab
workDescription: Engineered Java and Spring Boot Backend APIs for the in-house 'GuideMe' app, supporting 10k agents nationwide.
Integrated Salesforce REST APIs, contributed to DB design, and optimized database transactions for enhanced app performance.
Implemented Agile principles for sprint backlog delivery using GitHub-based CI/CD pipelines.
Collaborated closely with backend, frontend, and QA teams to ensure on-schedule implementation of key functionality.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Innover Digital
workDescription: Designed and deployed serverless applications on AWS using API Gateway and Lambda functions.
Implemented State machines and Step functions for streamlined workflows.
Integrated DynamoDB for efficient data management, leading to scalable and cost-effective solutions.
Led the design and implementation of 7 end-to-end features using RESTful microservices, transforming legacy applications into a cloud-hosted suite for SSENSE Fashion Company.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Siemens Technology and Private Limited
workDescription: Developed secure and scalable RESTful APIs using Java Spring Boot, AWS serverless framework, and MS-SQL.
Optimized existing Java APIs through code migration to modular and scalable NodeJS services within the AWS Cloud.
Resolved critical bugs, employed Cucumber for development and testing, improving application performance reliability.

experiences.title: Full Stack Intern
experiences.subtitle: Siemens Technology and Private Limited
workDescription: Assisted the Senior Architect in designing and implementing an e-commerce platform for selling replaceable parts.
Contributed to core API development using ASP.NET and integrated MongoDB.
